comment: The main text box containing Chinese characters in seal script and explanations, arranged vertically in columns. It includes entries such as '銖', '鉊', '鈞', '錍', etc., with definitions and phonetic annotations (e.g., '从金朱聲市朱切'). The right margin contains page numbers and titles: '小四百三' at top, '說文地四上' vertically, '王' and '孫佩' below.
